title: "Pindrop® to Unveil Deep Voice 3 at RSA, Extending Company’s Lead in Voice Security"
excerpt: "Pindrop®, the pioneer in voice security and authentication, today announced the launch of Deep Voice™ 3, the new version of its market-leading voice recognition technology. Built on advanced machine learning and deep neural networks, Deep Voice 3 is designed to more accurately recognize the voice of callers at a contact center with less speech."
